dcterms:creator: A. Stubbs
C. Kotfila
O. Uzuner
dcterms:description: The i2b2 2014 data set contains 790 annotated clinical narratives, which were de-identified to replace identifiable information with realistic fake information. The data includes patients diagnosed with diabetes and is used for training and evaluating de-identification methodologies.
dcterms:title: i2b2 2014 Data Set

dcterms:creator: B. Moody
P. Szolovits
L. A. Celi
R. G. Mark
dcterms:description: MIMIC-III is a freely accessible critical care database that contains a wealth of clinical data, including patient demographics, vital signs, laboratory results, medications, and more, which can be used for various research purposes.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III

dcterms:creator: O. Uzuner
P. Szolovits
I. Kohane
dcterms:description: The i2b2 Challenges (2006 and 2014) provided datasets for de-identification tasks, which are valuable resources for advancing research in the area of natural language processing for clinical records.
dcterms:title: i2b2 Challenges (2006 and 2014)
